Polar FT1
For the first steps in heart rate-based training
CONNECT
  • You will hear an audible notification of the right heart rate during your workout;
  • You will see an informative graphical display of the target training heart rate zones;
  • You will also see information about your calorie intake per workout;
  • You will be able to see data for 10 training sessions.
    • back

client feedback

Sara Miller
2 half marathons
I didn't know what to buy for myself - I turned to the guys from RunSmart - they picked up a heart rate monitor that suited my goals and financial possibilities. After some time, I decided to upgrade my gadget, so I went there without hesitation.

New goals - new gadget!

Thank you Sport-Farm
Lauri Thomson
1 half marathon
That's a cool heart rate monitor thing. I used to run without one. Turns out I was just making things worse for myself. I bought a heart rate monitor and got a training session as a gift. I had my first training session together, they taught me how to use the new gadget. They also explained the basics of anatomy and made a training plan for the month ahead.

Prepared for my first half marathon with them! Thank you!!!
Marie Bravis
2 half marathons
I couldn't start running for a long time, as I had started several times before, but it got hard and I gave up. I heard about RunSmart and running with heart rate control from my friends and decided to give it a try.

Called, the guys asked about my goals and found a very interesting discounted option! Now running and enjoying running! I've already run 2 half marathons and a few shorter races and have no intention of stopping!

Thank you!!!
Dnipro str.Shevchenko 73b
